## Data description {.smaller}

:::: {.columns}

::: {.column width="60%"}
- 93 patients undergoing radical cystectomy
- Data collected from 1993 to 2004
- Only metadata we use is the smoking status and metastasis
- Total number of genes is 54,675
- After sd 48,932
:::

::: {.column width="40%"}
```{r}
#| echo: false
library(table1)
library(tidyverse)

data_describe <- read_tsv("../data/04_dat_desc.tsv",
                            show_col_types = FALSE)
```

```{r}
data_describe |> 
  mutate(Metastasis = factor(Metastasis)) |> 
  table1(x = formula(~ Smoking + Metastasis), 
         data = _,
         caption = "Overview of number of patients who have metastasis and smoking status")
```
:::
